name: Wind Dragon Wyrmling
description: A medium-sized dragon embodying the unpredictable nature of storms, with vibrant blue scales and stormy wing patterns.
memorable: Notable for its wind-based abilities and its ability to control the battlefield with stormy breath.
goals: Typically seeks to assert dominance in its territory and to harness the power of storms.
relations: Related to other elemental dragons, particularly those connected to air and storms.
environment: Often found in areas prone to storms or high winds, such as mountainous or coastal regions.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity and Strength, with immunity to lightning and resistance to cold damage.
weaknesses: Lower hit points compared to its speed and strength; as a young creature, it lacks powerful spellcasting abilities.
attacks: Can use a bite attack dealing piercing damage and a breath attack that damages and pushes enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest Breath, delivering bludgeoning damage and environmental control, extinguishing flames in its wake.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without sight.
skills: Skilled in Acrobatics, Perception, and Stealth, demonstrating agility and awareness in combat.
additional_information: Can see through fog and mist with Storm Sight.
Benefits from Elusive ability to evade restrictions in movement.
Uses its speed and agility for tactical advantage.
Interacts unpredictably with the environment during stormy conditions.
test_queries: young chaotic dragon with storm abilities
dragon that breathes wind and controls weather
medium dragon resistant to cold and lightning
agile wymling that flies and walks fast
draconic creature with blindsight and evasive tactics
